short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring a touch of tranquility and natural beauty to your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Features a charming field of chamomile flowers in full bloom, creating a calming background filled with white petals and vibrant yellow centers. The soft green foliage adds a fresh contrast, giving your browser a peaceful, nature-inspired look. Perfect for anyone who loves flowers or simply wants a serene, floral touch to brighten up their browsing experience.
